summary:
You can kill dragon, you can absorb soul of dragon, and you can shout like a dragon. But it has not you to become a real dovahkiin. :)

You have to standing on the ledge, watching beautiful view of skyrim (just like Skyrim Official Wallpaper) and settling a hideout of Tiber Septim, the previous Dovahkiin. It all makes you a real dovahkiin.. :)
descriptionHtml:
=====================================================================================================================================

[center] [b] [size=20] [color=red] TOLUCAN [/color] [/size] [/b] [/center]
[center] [size=10] [color=orange] Tiber Septims Hideout [/color] [/size] [/center]

=====================================================================================================================================

[center][img]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/images/15407-1-1334983284.jpg[/img][/center]

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------


[center]First of all, i am sorry if there are words or phrases that are less well in this my first mod description. Because, English is not my native language. I used Machine Translator to make my mod description. I am sorry if there are fuzzy words or phrases.[/center]


-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------


[center]Tolucan. This is the place for simple player type. The player who do not want to get tired of running every room in a large place or uncomfortable in a small place. The player who want to get easy access to player house in every city.[/center]


-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
[center] [b] [size=12] [color=yellow] TESTIMONIES [/color] [/size] [/b] [/center] 
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------


[color=green]leathernecktoo[/color] : omno,an amazing mod.The attention to detail,layout and the amount of time it must have taken you to produce this masterpiece is outstanding.It works like a charm for me.I can highly recommend this for the main player residence.Endorsement given and well deserved.Many thanks for sharing.

[color=green]kharismax[/color] : omno, this is the best house i\'ve ever tried so far ..... :) nice job, the creation room is great..... all in one room. i endorse u.....

[color=green]HerKrunk[/color] : I really like your house, next to Mage Mansion this is probably one of my favorites so far! 

[color=green]AzureCrow[/color] : Finally...rooms with actually GOOD LIGHTING

[color=green]SilverWolfMNG[/color] : thank you very much, Omno. This mod is very great. I really really like this place. and yes, Aishley is too hot to be ignored XD 

[color=green]Gatorz08[/color] : It is well laid out and a striking beautiful home. Thank you for all the work you did on this mod. Endorsed.

[color=green]Darzuk[/color] : Endorsed and Thank You. My Followers love it. So do I. No problems or bugs noted as of yet.

[color=green]lextanium[/color] : Beautiful =). Not too big, not too small, and it\'s very close to nature. I already have a house mod but I wna dl this n house some of my npcs here.

[color=green]shayearafreya[/color] : Thank you for the fix omno, the place is absolutely stunning. i love it.

[color=green]ZephyrGames[/color] : looks very nice.



-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
[center] [b] [size=12] [color=yellow] VIDEO [/color] [/size] [/b] [/center] 
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------


[center][youtube]x526FFrgw_s[/youtube][/center]



-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
[center] [b] [size=12] [color=yellow] HISTORY [/color] [/size] [/b] [/center] 
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------


Blades of Skyrim give magnificent place to the previous Dovahkiin, Tiber Septim, to make easier his action in Skyrim. They Call it Tolucan. This place created by a Great Wizard Blades, Amaethon. In this place, there is an area, the Blades call it The Circlum. At the center of the Circlum, lying an Earth Crystal. The Earth Crystal make suitable condition environment of this place, so Dovahkiin can live for decades without worrying about temperature, food, water, etc. Moreover, Earth Crystal opened the portal to the desired places. As long the places are contacted to the ground. Tolucan can only be entered by Dovahkiin. Dovahkiin Blood can open or close the door. 

When Dovahkiin at the present come in to Tolucan, he/she meets a family. The Bodens Family is stuck in Tolucan and live  for decades. The Father, Geraint, and The Mother, Lynn, was Blades member. When they are young, both looking for Blades Legacy. They went through the ceiling of Tolucan. Until the storm trapped them in that place. Many years, they tried to get out of the Tolucan, but it vain. 

After Dovahkiin inardvertenly helps the Bodens Family, Bodens Family support all the Dovahkiins activities in Skyrim. 



-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
[center] [b] [size=12] [color=yellow] FEATURES [/color] [/size] [/b] [/center] 
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------


You can see Bad Graphic Screenshot at image tab.  :D


[color=yellow]Entrance[/color]

[]	Blades door can be acces by dovahkiin blood. **careful that you will run out of blood, i think tiber septim bleed to death in this place just only to open or close the door. :P


[color=yellow]Main Hall[/color]

[]	Garden (Waterfall, pond, Gazebo, etc)
[]	The Circlum (portal door connected to player house every city, archmage room, ragged flagon, and dawnstar sanctuary)
[]	Shrine altar. Each Shrine grants a blessing from the specific deity while removing any existing blessing. 
[]	Doomstone altar. Thirteen monolith available. Each Doomstone grants one or more greater power when touched. 
[]	Training area. Arrow supply available.


[color=yellow]Private Room[/color]

[]	Master bedroom
[]	Study room
[]	Display area (Activable weapon plaque, display case, mannequin, and dragon priest mask holder)
[]	Library (Activable bookshelves and labeled cases, such as: book case, scroll case, and note case)
[]	Vault 


[color=yellow]Creation room[/color]

[]	Enchanting area. Soul gem supply available.
[]	Alchemy area
[]	Smithing area (Smelter, Forge, Workbench, Grindstone, and Tanning Rack)
[]	Container area, gives a labeled container. (Unenchanted Weapon Chest, Enchanted Armor Chest, Unenchanted Necklace Chest, etc)
        It is safe to place your item in creation and private room. Items will not be lost if placed in a storage. Except at followers room.
[]	Portal Door (Alikr base door) connected to Private Room, so you dont have to get tired running around only for displaying your weapon/armor creation.


[color=yellow]Back Yard[/color]

[]	Kitchen, bar, and dining room.
[]	Bedroom for followers
[]	Farming area
[]	A Chopping Block
[]	The Cliff, Beautiful view of skyrim


[color=yellow]NPC[/color]

[]	Geraint Boden
        Blades Member, warrior class, his specialties are one-handed and shield, sneak, archery, and follower able.
[]	Lynn Boden
        Wizard Blades, a former of shaman forsworn, wife of Geraint, her specialties are destruction magic, sneak, and follower able.
[]	Ryce
        Son of Geraint and Lynn, warrior class, his specialties are two-handed, heavy-armor, follower able, can be recruit  to join the Blades, and marriage able.
[]	Aishley
        Daughter of Geraint and Lynn, sister of Ryce, assasin class, dual wielding weapon, good with archery, sneak, follower able, can be recruit to join the Blades, and marriage able.
[]	Lot of wandering animal and insect. To keep you are not living alone in place.


[color=yellow]Other[/color]

[]	Fully Navmeshed to Follower/NPC
[]	Have schedule activities for NPC.
[]      Various friendly Sound and Lightning (A different natural sounds in the daytime with nightime. Magical, natural, and Fire lightning available)



-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
[center] [b] [size=12] [color=yellow] HOW TO GET THERE [/color] [/size] [/b] [/center] 
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------


[]	The best way to get there, there is a Delphine trap door at the front Sleeping Giant Inn, Riverwood. The Trap Door used by Delphine to escape from the pursuit of Thalmor to Cyrodiil. Get in there. Then you will be somewhere in Falkreath. Follow the road up to the hill. You will find Talos Statue at the left side of the road. Just follow where the Talos Statue headed to, you will find two other Talos Statue. Follow it, you will find Tolucan.
[]	Or just find a trap door in every your house in the city. Then open it.
[]	Or just type coc 0tolucan in command console. If you are lazy. :)



-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
[center] [b] [size=12] [color=yellow] INSTALLATION [/color] [/size] [/b] [/center]  
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------


[]	Manual
Just Copy the file (tolucan.esp) to your data directory and make sure tolucan.esp checked under data in the launcher.
[]	Nexus Mod Manager
Download with NMM, double click on the MOD tab



-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
[center] [b] [size=12] [color=yellow] NOTE [/color] [/size] [/b] [/center]
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------


[] If crash at main menu, you have to enable Apachii Sky Hair Mod
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=10168
[] If spooky mannequin wandering around.. :D  you have to enable this mod
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=10652


-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
[center][b][size=12][color=yellow] RECOMMENDED MODS [/color][/size][/b][/center]
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------


This Mod gives me some ideas, solve problems, and used on my mod

[]	Mannequins Stay Still
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=10652
[]	Spouse Can Live Everywhere
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=11370
[]	Suncrest Hall
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=10380
[]	Dovahkiin Hideout
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=12553
[]	Apachii Sky Hair 
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=10168
[]	Better Females
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=2812



-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

A big thanks to Bethesda for beautiful game and kit, Nexus for fill my needs,  and everyone  who downloaded and endorse my first mod. I apologize if the quality of visualization is less, perhaps with a good quality of your computer, the result will be different.

in the future, i want to make an optimization version... to make good performance in this mod.. 
i want to make good mod with my bad quality computer??????   [ask to myself]  :DDDD


-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
author: omno
